title: Demure Mineral Make Up, Dark Warm Mineral Foundation Makeup, Concealer Makeup, Natural Makeup Made with Pure Crushed Minerals, Loose Face Powder. Demure Mineral Makeup
features: Dark Warm Foundation is for darker skin tones with golden/olive undertones. Our Mineral Makeup is all natural and water resistant. Easy to apply and lets your skin breathe.

Our Mineral Foundation has no chemicals, fillers, harmful preservatives or other skin irritants like talc, rice or bismuth oxychloride. Free of additives, our foundation also contains no binders and no fragrance. Our makeup is highly pigmented because we use pure minerals and a little goes a long way. You can easily create a flawless and more radiant appearance that is also beneficial for your skin!

Demure Mineral Foundation is lightweight, yet offers excellent coverage. Apply a thin layer for sheer to light coverage and additional layers for medium to full coverage. Custom apply to build up your desired coverage. Any of our 11 foundation colors can also be mixed to create your perfect shade.
Hypoallergenic and great for all skin types. Sensitive skin, oily skin, dry skin and mature skin can all benefit from our pure crushed minerals. Not tested on animals. Cruelty free. Made in the USA.

RISK FREE. Try our Demure Mineral Foundation at no risk. If, for any reason, you are not happy with your order, contact us within 30 days of purchase and we will either replace the product or send you a refund.
